document_data.name: Noose's Knots
document_data.mainbody: '''Noose's Knots''' was a business in the [[Skullport/Lower Trade Lanes|Lower Trade Lanes]] of [[Skullport]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Structure: Noose's Knots was a one-story building in fair condition.
document_data.Description: Noose's Knots was owned by veteran sailor known simply as [[Noose]]. He had turned his extensive seafaring knowledge of [[rope]]s, [[net]]s, and knotwork into a thriving business. Known for providing ropes of superior quality, Noose and his small team of skilled hands were regularly found braiding fibers such as [[hemp]] into durable rope, charging above-average prices that reflected their craftsmanship.
